tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RobotMaintenanceSchedule (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Robots (
  robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  manufacture_date DATE,
  maintenance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Schedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_id INT,
  schedule_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
  technician_name VARCHAR(255),
  CONSTRAINT fk_robot_id FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES Robots(robot_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Robot_Models (
  model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
  weight FLOAT,
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE Technicians (
  technician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  technician_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  technician_specialty VARCHAR(255),
  experience_years INT,
  certification BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE robot_maintenance_schedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  robot_id INT,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
  technician_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE robots (
  robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT,
  date_acquired DATE NOT NULL,
  warranty_expiry DATE,
  last_maintenance_date DATE
);
